SEARCH
Package Cards.TypeOfCard

Class Card_Minion

java.lang.Object
Cards.Card
Cards.TypeOfCard.Card_Minion
public class Card_Minion extends Card
Represents a minion card in the game. Minions are a type of card that can be played on the board, usually having health points and able to engage in battles with other minions.

    Constructs a new minion card with specified attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card_Minion

      public Card_Minion(String name, int manaCost, int power, int hp, int whose)
      Constructs a new minion card with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the minion card.
      manaCost - The mana cost required to play the minion card.
      power - The attack power of the minion card.
      hp - The health points of the minion card.
      whose - The player identifier to whom this card belongs.

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      public void getInfo()
      Outputs detailed information about this minion card, including its name, mana cost, power, health points, and ID. Useful for debugging or displaying card details in the game interface.
      Overrides:
      getInfo in class Card
